id.description: Unique ID of the holding record

permanentLocationId.description: The permanent shelving location in which an item resides.

discoverySuppress.description: Indicates that the record should not be displayed in a discovery system

hrid.description: the human readable ID, also called eye readable ID. A system-assigned sequential ID which maps to the Instance ID

sourceId.description: (A reference to) the source of a holdings record

formerIds.description: Previous identifiers assigned to the holding

tags.description: arbitrary tags associated with this holding

holdingsTypeId.description: unique ID for the type of this holdings record, a UUID

callNumberPrefix.description: Prefix of the call number on the holding level.

callNumber.description: Call Number is an identifier assigned to an item, usually printed on a label attached to the item.

callNumberSuffix.description: Suffix of the call number on the holding level.

notes.description: Notes about action, copy, binding etc.
